casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Sil SALVATORE, Appellant. No. 468. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit July 5, 1932. James E. Wilkinson, of Brooklyn, N. Y., for appellant. George Z. Medalie, U. S. Atty., of New York City (William B. Herlands, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
